api_list.name: Returns top five richest people in the world.
api_list.description: Returns top five richest people in the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://richest-peeps.p.rapidapi.com/richest-peeps"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "richest-peeps.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://richest-peeps.p.rapidapi.com/richest-peeps"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
